text:
Hello Anna!
Where are you from?
comment: Hello Visitor! This information is in the about me section.
name: Visitor

text:
Hey!
What did you use to create this website?
comment:
Hey!

Everything I used to create this website is listed in my hard skills.

I published the full site on Heroku.
Frontend without backend published on Github pages.
title: This website

text:
Hello, I have a question about your development.

Are you planning to learn more about Node.js and another frontend framework like React?

Hey!
I want to see the site on Heroku, but it won't open.
What happened? Why is the site not working?
comment:
Hey!

On this site, I use a free database to showcase my skills. The free database has a limit on the number of queries.

If you want to view a website on Heroku but it won't open, please contact me and I will relaunch the website with a new database.
title: Website not working

text:
Hello!
What do you do in your free time?
Hey! Are you interested in relocate to other countries?
